name: armoury
content:

[ C ] all the weapons and military equipment that a country owns: The two countries signed an agreement to reduce their nuclear armouries.
[ C ] a place where weapons and other military equipment are stored: Fighter planes have successfully bombed the enemy's main armoury.
[ C usually singular ] things or qualities that can be used to achieve a particular aim: The only weapon left in his armoury was indifference.
